com.example.miguel.myapplication.service

Class AuthorizationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.miguel.myapplication.service.AuthorizationBuilder

  • public final class AuthorizationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    String builder for the authorization header block for accesses to the VitaDock Server.

    • Method Detail

      • createUnauthorizedAccessRequestAuthorizationHeader

        public static java.lang.String createUnauthorizedAccessRequestAuthorizationHeader(java.lang.String requestUrl,
                                                                  java.lang.String applicationToken,
                                                                  java.lang.String applicationSecret)
                                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Build authorization header for requesting an Unauthorized Access.
        Parameters:
        applicationToken - Token of the requesting Application
        applicationSecret - Secret of the requesting Application
        Returns:
        The Authorization header as a string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createAccessRequestAuthorizationHeader

        public static java.lang.String createAccessRequestAuthorizationHeader(java.lang.String applicationToken,
                                                      java.lang.String applicationSecret,
                                                      java.lang.String unauthorizedAccessToken,
                                                      java.lang.String unauthorizedAccessSecret,
                                                      java.lang.String verifierToken)
                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Build authorization header for requesting an Access.
        Parameters:
        applicationToken - Token of the Consumer's application
        applicationSecret - Secret of the Consumer's application
        unauthorizedAccessToken - Valid Unauthorized Access Token received earlier from the server
        unauthorizedAccessSecret - Unauthorized Secret received earlier from the server
        verifierToken - Verifier Token received from a callback from the server
        Returns:
        The Authorization header as a string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createSaveDataRequestAuthorizationHeader

        public static java.lang.String createSaveDataRequestAuthorizationHeader(java.lang.String requestUrl,
                                                        java.lang.String parameterString,
                                                        java.lang.String applicationToken,
                                                        java.lang.String applicationSecret,
                                                        java.lang.String accessToken,
                                                        java.lang.String accessSecret)
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Build authorization header for accessing an Access for saving data on the server.
        Parameters:
        moduleId - The id of the module to access
        parameterString - The encoded parameter string
        applicationToken - Token of the Consumer's application
        applicationSecret - Secret of the Consumer's application
        unauthorizedAccessToken - Unauthorized Secret received earlier from the server
        accessToken - Access Token received earlier from the server
        accessSecret - Access Secret received earlier from the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if there was an error encoding the URL

      • createLoadDataRequestAuthorizationHeader

        public static java.lang.String createLoadDataRequestAuthorizationHeader(java.lang.String requestUrl,
                                                        int start,
                                                        int max,
                                                        java.lang.String dateSince,
                                                        java.lang.String applicationToken,
                                                        java.lang.String applicationSecret,
                                                        java.lang.String accessToken,
                                                        java.lang.String accessSecret)
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Build authorization header for accessing an Access for loading data from the server.
        Parameters:
        moduleId - id of the module to load data from
        start - first entry of entry returned
        max - maximum number of entries returned
        dateSince - retrieve all entries with a measurement date later than this
        applicationToken - Token of the Consumer's application
        applicationSecret - Secret of the Consumer's application
        accessToken - Access Token received earlier from the server
        accessSecret - Access Secret received earlier from the server
        Returns:
        The Authorization header as a string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createRequestUrl

        public static java.lang.String createRequestUrl(int moduleId,
                                int start,
                                int max,
                                java.lang.String dateSince)
        Helper function to build the request URL.
        Parameters:
        moduleId - id of the module to load data from
        start - first entry of entry returned
        max - maximum number of entries returned
        dateSince - retrieve all entries with a measurement date later than this
        Returns:
        URL of the service to send the request to
